===Prerequisites===

You need OS X 10.5 or newer, and Xcode 3.1.1 or newer.

=== build scripts ===

Checkout code from http://objcmapper.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ and you'll see to scripts
 * [http://code.google.com/p/nobjective/source/browse/trunk/build_debug.sh build_debug.sh] - builds library with debug information and tracing 
 * [http://code.google.com/p/nobjective/source/browse/trunk/build_release.sh build_release.sh] - build with comiler optimizations and withot tracing

and use them or nant directly to build library
